faqsSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqsSection.description: Answers to common questions about Fellow Notes ‚Äî features, plans, and more. Still need help? Reach out to our support team.

faqs.question: What is Fellow Notes?
faqs.answer: Fellow Notes is an all-in-one study platform designed to help students access notes, previous year questions, AI tools, and a supportive student community.

faqs.question: How does the AI study assistant work?
faqs.answer: Our AI study assistant helps you summarize notes, generate practice questions, and provide explanations to enhance your learning experience.

faqs.question: What are the differences between Free and Premium plans?
faqs.answer: The Free plan offers basic access to notes and community features, while Premium plans unlock advanced AI tools, exclusive content, and personalized support.

faqs.question: Can I share my notes with other students?
faqs.answer: Yes! Fellow Notes encourages collaboration. You can share your notes and resources within our student community.

faqs.question: Is there a mobile app available?
faqs.answer: Currently, Fellow Notes is accessible via web browsers. We are working on developing a mobile app for a better on-the-go experience.
